sections.heading: 01|Formation of insurance company
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAny number of persons, not less than thirteen, may associate and form a company to make insurance upon the lives of individuals, and every type of insuranc
